title: League Crashes Computer
body:
Lately, and I mean starting this month, my PC would crash about 20-35 minutes into a game. It appears that it would be overheating but now when I go try to use a fan near my PC it crashes shortly after minion spawn. I have my settings at low and I want to know what's going on as I have a 10 minute leaverbuster now. 

Any help would be highly appreciated.

replies.body:
Just to confirm this isn't caused by a bad driver or power setting, I'd like you to work through the [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) we've written up. If your issue persists after taking those steps, we can hook you up with one of our tech specialists to run some hardware tests to see if your GPU or CPU is under extreme thermal stress.

Let me know what happens.
